Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I just know that <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff> is <clr:0000>down the
tracks<clr:ffff>.

There are monsters around, so I can't
walk there. How am I supposed to get
this <clr:0000>mine cart <clr:ffff>to move?
Talk34: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>Hang on... I can't get into the cart...
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wah! What'd you do, guy?


<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>Please don't do anything scary while
I'm in the cart.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Since I've made it down the tracks, all I've
gotta do now is look for <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>.

...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, hey, guy. How come you're still here?


<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>That was a close one. He almost overheard that I'm
looking for Gorondia...

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, oh, oh! You probably want a
reward, huh?
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>Hang on, I can't get into the cart... Are
you messing with me, guy?
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to go to <clr:0000>that end <clr:ffff>of the mine-
cart track.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:5000>Gorondia has gotta be over there. I can feel it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I'm gonna find treasure that's worth sooo
much more than that. I'm gonna be rich!

Once I'm rich, I'll hire you, guy!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:QuestionAngry>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>A. <sp:5:0:0>Sec. <sp:5:0:0>Guy!


Everyone knows that a cart won't move
unless it's on some tracks.

<sp:3:0:2:0200>Can you please put it on the tracks before
I get on board?

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>My cart is the one with the <clr:0000>cushion <clr:ffff>on it.


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't want any bruises on my behind, so
make sure you've got the right one.
Talk25: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>That was close. I barely made it out alive.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I wanted to give ya something, but your
pouch is full, so I can't.

I wanna give you a Zonai charge, so you
should make space for it, and then come
back here.
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Guy!<sp:5:0:0> What are you doing!


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Next time you do something weird,
I'm getting off of the cart.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey! It moved?!<sp:5:0:0> Who's there? Don't go
touching things that aren't yours!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Pretty sure someone said you can get to
<clr:0000>the end of the tracks <clr:ffff>if you get in this
<clr:0000>mine cart<clr:ffff>...
But...how do you make it move?!


I bet the ancient city of <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff> is
over there.
Talk14:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Gorondia<clr:ffff>, where the <clr:0000>Gorons of old <clr:ffff>lived...


I'm gonna sneak over there real quiet-like
and find that treasure!

I just need to get this <clr:0000>mine cart <clr:ffff>moving
somehow so I can <clr:0000>get to the end of
the tracks<clr:ffff>...
<sp:5:0:0>Huh?
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa, hey! Who are you, guy?<sp:5:0:0> Me? I'm
not doing nothin'.

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Well...if you're wondering, Gorondia<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>is the
legendary place where the <clr:0000>Gorons of old<clr:ffff>
used to live.
I heard there's an amazing treasure
stored there too. They had even more
advanced technology than we do now!
And I heard they used to ride in
<clr:0000>strange vehicles<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>I wanted to use this <clr:0000>mine cart<clr:ffff> to search
for the treasure, but...I can't get it
to budge.
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Anyway, you better not tell anyone all my
secrets, OK?
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:QuestionNormal>Guy.


If you want this Zonai charge, make some
room in your pouch, and come back.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What'll I do if I can't make it to the end of
the tracks?
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa, hey! Who are you, guy?<sp:5:0:0> You really
scared me!

For a second, I thought maybe you'd
overheard my big secret.
Talk04:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I just know that <clr:0000>Gorondia <clr:ffff>is down the tracks...


There are monsters around, so I can't walk there.
How am I supposed to get this <clr:0000>mine cart<clr:ffff> going?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> When did you fix it?<sp:0:4:0>And how did you know I wanted it fixed?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>It doesn't matter! I'm saved.<sp:5:0:0> OK, here
I go!
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Somethin' not working?<sp:5:0:0> I guess we
can start over then...
Talk18:

Then I can finally reward ya.
Talk09:

mean...<sp:5:0:0>I've made it to the other end of
the track!
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>This is scary. I think I'm done.<sp:5:1:0> I'm getting
off and heading back...
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry>Geez, guy!<sp:5:0:0> That was scary.


Please don't do anything weird when I'm
riding in the cart.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, guy! Gorondia isn't that way!


If you're not going to take me to
Gorondia, I'm going back.
Talk32:

I can't do this anymore. I'm going back.
